<title level="1" pfs="">[Kereek](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2287)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 30

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Kereek](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2287)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 196</row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), robes, _wand of [burning hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)_ (1st)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +11 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 85

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Arcane Spontaneous Spells** DC 22, attack +14
- **Cantrips (3rd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180), [Pest Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=217) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289) (2 slots), [Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)

**Hurried Retreat** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The kobold warrior is adjacent to at least one enemy. **Effect** The kobold warrior Strides up to its Speed plus 5 feet and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. It must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy.

</column>
name: Kereek
